question: Which Indian state/UT has claimed to be the first in the country to be coronavirus-free?
explanation:
As per the recent announcement of the Chief Minister of Goa, it is the first state in the country to become coronavirus-free. 
The state had seven patients who had contracted the coronavirus and all the 7 patients have been discharged. As the repeat samples of the patients were tested negative, they will be quarantined for further observation. After Goa, Manipur has also become a green state, free of coronavirus infections.
